title: Why are Wilmington Firefighters allowed to drink alcohol in their blue dress uniforms?  I saw several at a bar one weekend drinking and found it to be a bad representation for our city.  I realize that they are (hopefully) not on duty, but the appearance of city employees drinking in uniform left me with a bad impression.
